data.name: ReadInfrastructure
data.value: select top(1) SYSTEM_GENERATED_I, SITUATION_NUMBER, PROCESS_STATUS, REASON_CODE, BUSINESS_OBJECT_CD, DENORM_NUMERIC_12, DENORM_TEXT_12, DENORM_DATE, DENORM_TIMESTAMP, INITIATING_ST_CD, CSENET_IN_OUT_CODE, CASE_NUMBER, CSE_PERSON_NUM, CASE_UNIT_NUM, USER_ID, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, REFERENCE_DATE, [FUNCTION], CASE_UNIT_STATE, DETAIL from CKT_INFRASTRUCTURE where SYSTEM_GENERATED_I = @systemGeneratedI

data.name: UpdateInfrastructure
data.value: update CKT_INFRASTRUCTURE set SITUATION_NUMBER = @situationNumber, PROCESS_STATUS = @processStatus, REASON_CODE = @reasonCode, BUSINESS_OBJECT_CD = @businessObjectCd, DENORM_NUMERIC_12 = @denormNumeric12, DENORM_TEXT_12 = @denormText12, DENORM_DATE = @denormDate, DENORM_TIMESTAMP = @denormTimestamp, INITIATING_ST_CD = @initiatingStCd, CSENET_IN_OUT_CODE = @csenetInOutCode, CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber, CSE_PERSON_NUM = @csePersonNum, CASE_UNIT_NUM = @caseUnitNum, USER_ID = @userId, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, REFERENCE_DATE = @referenceDate, [FUNCTION] = @function, CASE_UNIT_STATE = @caseUnitState, DETAIL = @detail where SYSTEM_GENERATED_I = @systemGeneratedI
